description: This file defines a React functional component named TopMenu that renders a top navigation menu with keyboard navigation support, including arrow key and Enter activation. It manages focus states for menu items, handles key events for navigation, and uses React hooks such as useEffect and useRef.

methods.name: TopMenu
methods.description: React functional component rendering a top navigation menu with keyboard navigation.

methods.name: onKeyDown
methods.description: Handles keyboard events for arrow navigation and selecting menu items.
